option.label: PAD Mode 1 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 1.

option.label: PAD Mode 2 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 2.

option.label: PAD Mode 3 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 3.

option.label: PAD Mode 4 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 4.

option.label: PAD Mode 5 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 5.

option.label: PAD Mode 6 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 6.

option.label: PAD Mode 7 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 7.

option.label: PAD Mode 8 configuration
option.description: Select which options are available on PAD Mode 8.

option.label: Loop size of the smallest Pad in Loop Padmode
option.description: This specifies the smallest loop size, the larger loopsizes are automatically available on the other pads.

option.label: Jump size of the smallest Pad in BeatJump Padmode
option.description: This specifies the smallest jump size, the larger jumpsizes are automatically available on the other pads.

option.label: Number of Hot Cue pads:
option.description: How man pads you are going to use to control Hot Cues.

option.label: Add a row with Play and Cue buttons to the Hot Cue Pad selection. Only works if you choose to use less than 16 Hot Cue Pads.
option.description: When active, there will be an Play, Cue and Track-Start / Track-End buttons added to the Hot Cue Pads.

option.label: Use Fader for Deck Volume if no FX-Button is active.
option.description: When selected, the Faders can be used to control the Volume of the active Deck as long as no FX-Button is active. If disabled, there will be no action at all if no FX-Button is active.

option.label: Use Fader for Quick Effect Super Metaknob if Effect on Pad is active and no FX-Button is active,
option.description: When selected, the Faders can be used to control the Super Metaknob of the active Deck for the Pad- selected Quickeffect as long as no FX-Button is active. If disabled, there will be no action at all if no FX-Button is active.

option.label: Use Slip Mode during Slicer and Slicer Roll
option.description: When active, the playback continues muted in the background during the slice. Once disabled, the audible playback will resume where the track would have been.

option.label: Use Slip Mode during Loops
option.description: When active, the playback continues muted in the background during the loop. Once disabled, the audible playback will resume where the track would have been.
